sentence.Network_cn: 最终，水会渗透进周围的混凝土中。

sentence.Network_en: Once the euphoria surrounding this victory subsides, reality must return.
sentence.Network_cn: 这场胜利的喜悦退去后，人们将不得不回归现实。

sentence.Network_en: They climbed upward along the steep cliffs surrounding the village.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们沿着村庄周围的陡峭悬崖往上爬。

means.word_mean: 地方的,局部的,相邻的,附近的

entry.def: If a person or thing is surrounded by something, that thing is situated all around them.

example.ex: The small churchyard was surrounded by a rusted wrought-iron fence...
example.tran: 不大的教堂墓地周边围着一圈生锈的熟铁栅栏。

example.ex: The shell surrounding the egg has many important functions.
example.tran: 蛋壳有许多重要的功能。

entry.def: If you are surrounded by soldiers or police, they spread out so that they are in positions all the way around you.

example.ex: When the car stopped in the town square it was surrounded by soldiers and militiamen...
example.tran: 当汽车停在城镇广场时立刻被士兵和民兵包围了。

example.ex: He tried to run away but gave up when he found himself surrounded...
example.tran: 他试图逃跑，但发现已被包围时只好放弃了这个念头。

entry.def: The circumstances, feelings, or ideas which surround something are those that are closely associated with it.

example.ex: The decision had been agreed in principle before today's meeting, but some controversy surrounded it...
example.tran: 该决定在今天的会议之前就已达成原则上的共识，但围绕这一决定还存在一些争议。

example.ex: Once the euphoria surrounding this victory subsides, reality must return.
example.tran: 这场胜利的喜悦退去后，人们将不得不回归现实。

entry.tran: 喜欢结交(某类人);确保身边总有(某类东西)
entry.def: If you surround yourself with certain people or things, you make sure that you have a lot of them near you all the time.

example.ex: He had made it his business to surround himself with a hand-picked group of bright young officers...
example.tran: 他总会亲手挑选一批聪明而年轻的军官常伴他左右。

example.ex: They love being surrounded by familiar possessions.
example.tran: 他们喜欢身边都是自己熟悉的物品。

entry.def: The surround of something such as a fireplace is the border, wall, or shelves around it.

example.ex: ...a small fireplace with a cast-iron surround.
The entire team enjoyed hot showers in the spacious surrounds of a new, modern village hall.
example.tran: 全队都在新建的现代化村会所的宽敞洗浴间享受了热水淋浴。

auth_sentence.content: The music surrounding it should also sound oddly tasteful.
auth_sentence.res_content: The music surrounding it should also sound oddly tasteful.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The music surrounding it should also sound oddly tasteful.

auth_sentence.res_content: Excitement surrounding the inauguration has been building for days.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Excitement surrounding the inauguration has been building for days.

auth_sentence.content: There is still a conspiracy of silence surrounding death.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is still a conspiracy of silence surrounding death.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is still a conspiracy of silence surrounding death.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 等在同辅音词根前表示"在下面;随后"; 2. 表示"超过,在……上面"

stems_affixes.word_buile: sur在下面;随后+rept爬+itious……的→在下面爬→鬼鬼崇崇的
sur超过,在……上面+plus多余;加→多出很多
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
surround[v.包围]+ing表名词→被围起来的状态→环境
sur超过,在……上面+charge费用→额外的收费→附加费
sur超过,在……上面+realism现实主义→n.超现实主义
sur超过,在……上面+veil面纱+lance→在面纱上看[隔了一层纱]看→临视
sur超过,在……上面+viv生命+al表名词→经过事故活着→幸存
sur在下面;随后+render给予→把[枪]放下去→投降
sur在下面;随后+round圆圈→在下面围一圈
sur超过,在……上面+mount山→在山上→登上
sur超过,在……上面+pass通过→在上面通过→超越

Sentence.sentence: The unique surroundings of his living place.
Andrew's runs a food pantry(食品堂)that serves the city and several of the surrounding towns.
In wider and more difficult areas of life, there is evidence to indicate that natural surroundings improve all kinds of things

Each group over the coming decades will need to address different issues surrounding food production, storage and transportation, as well as consumer expectations, if we are to continue to feed all our people.
They are better able to adapt to the surroundings.

sentences.en: He didn’t pay much attention to his surroundings.
sentences.cn: 他没有多注意他周围的环境。

sentences.en: Foxes started coming in from the surrounding countryside.
sentences.cn: 狐狸开始从附近的乡下跑进来。
